duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement EHS programs to minimize risk to employees, customers, and the environment.
Coordinate safety aspects of operations and engineering within the company and with external organizations.
Report and present safety-related status and issues to EH&S team and business groups.
Participate in compliance evaluation of products, programs, and facilities per company and governmental requirements.
Investigate accidents and specify corrective action programs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Occupational Health and Safety, Environmental Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
